nodes.text: Hal Lars was a Human male who resided on the space station the Wheel during the reign of the Galactic Empire, where he operated the equipment shop Hal's Parts Store. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, Lars was an elderly man and he relied on cybernetic eyes and cybernetic hearing to augment his senses. He had a good memory and possessed a detailed knowledge of the starships that passed through the Wheel.
